select t_pl_inboundorder.inboundDate ,t_pl_inboundorderitem.inboundOrderId, t_pl_inboundorderitem.inboundOrderItemId, t_pl_inboundorderitem.produceCompanyId, t_pl_inboundorderitem.wastesName, t_pl_inboundorderitem.wastesCode, t_pl_inboundorderitem.unitId, t_pl_inboundorderitem.wastesAmount, t_pl_inboundorderitem.beginningCount, t_pl_inboundorderitem.storageCount, t_pl_inboundorder.checkStateId, t_pl_outboundorder.outboundDate, t_pl_outboundorder.outboundOrderId, t_pl_outboundorder.outboundNumber, t_pl_outboundorder.clientId, t_pl_outboundorder.wasteCategory, t_pl_wasteinventory.actualCount, t_pl_wasteinventory.wareHouseId, t_quotationitem.unitPriceTax from (t_pl_inboundorderitem left join t_pl_inboundorder on t_pl_inboundorder.inboundOrderId=t_pl_inboundorderitem.inboundOrderId and (checkStateId is null or checkStateId != 69) and boundType='WasteInbound') left join t_pl_outboundorder on t_pl_outboundorder.inboundOrderItemId=t_pl_inboundorderitem.inboundOrderItemId and (t_pl_outboundorder.checkStateId is null or t_pl_outboundorder.checkStateId != 69) left join t_pl_wasteinventory on t_pl_wasteinventory.inboundOrderItemId=t_pl_inboundorderitem.inboundOrderItemId left join t_quotationitem on t_pl_inboundorderitem.wastesName=t_quotationitem.wastesName and t_pl_inboundorderitem.wastesCode=t_quotationitem.wastesCode order by inboundDate desc
limit #{page.start}, #{page.count};
select count(*) from t_pl_inboundorder where (checkStateId is null or checkStateId != 69) and boundType='WasteInbound';

select t_pl_inboundorder.inboundOrderId,t_pl_inboundorder.inboundDate ,t_pl_inboundorderitem.wastesCode,t_pl_inboundorderitem.wastesAmount, t_pl_outboundorder.outboundNumber,t_pl_wasteinventory.wareHouseId from (t_pl_inboundorderitem left join t_pl_inboundorder on t_pl_inboundorder.inboundOrderId=t_pl_inboundorderitem.inboundOrderId and (checkStateId is null or checkStateId != 69) left join t_pl_outboundorder on t_pl_outboundorder.inboundOrderItemId=t_pl_inboundorderitem.inboundOrderItemId and (t_pl_outboundorder.checkStateId is null or t_pl_outboundorder.checkStateId != 69) left join t_pl_wasteinventory on t_pl_wasteinventory.inboundOrderItemId=t_pl_inboundorderitem.inboundOrderItemId) where t_pl_inboundorder.boundType='WasteInbound' and (t_pl_inboundorderitem.wastesAmount-t_pl_outboundorder.outboundNumber > 0 or t_pl_outboundorder.outboundNumber is NULL) order by inboundDate desc;
